title: Career Journey
description: Fun questions about professional growth and career paths!

questions.text: What's often considered the best approach when starting a new role?

options.text: Make immediate changes to show authority
Listen, learn, and observe before suggesting changes
Tell everyone how your last company did things

questions.hint: Think about what builds trust with new colleagues.

questions.text: Which of these is most important for long-term career success?

options.text: Balance of technical, communication, and adaptability skills

questions.hint: Success typically requires multiple dimensions of skill.

questions.text: What's a good way to handle receiving critical feedback?

options.text: Argue that the feedback is wrong
Listen carefully, ask questions, and consider how to improve
Immediately ask for a different manager

questions.hint: Growth requires being open to improvement opportunities.
